content:
I just heard of PAC-ID for the first time:

"AÂ PAC-ID, which stands forÂ PubliclyÂ AddressableÂ ContentÂ IDentifier, is a globally unique identifier that operates independently of a central registry. It resembles a URL and serves to reference substances, devices, consumables, or measurement results." -- https://github.com/ApiniLabs/PAC-ID
